segments.text: I think Bill Clinton is a good president .

segments.text: But he has the sex scandal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Maybe he isn't a good husband , but he is a successful president .

segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , he is . Of course he makes mistakes , but who doesn ’ t .
